rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MKF2121, MKP2720, MKW2420} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
Unit was previously coded {MKC2130, MKF2131%, MKT213, MKT2131, MKW2131}

description: With increasing availability of data and computing power, more and more companies are using data driven decision making, and data is becoming the heart of the corporate decision making process. In this unit, you will learn the power of marketing analytics and its effectiveness in making better decisions. Working with multiple marketing metrics and models, you will develop skills to identify problems, analyse data and develop optimal decisions for various marketing issues.
